content:
Hey ya'all :wave:

I am wondering if there are any plans to continue working on support for DWARF debug info for wasm-bindgen? There's an open issue for quite some time now but there hasn't been a lot of progress. https://github.com/rustwasm/walrus/issues/67

Are any folks working on this or has anything changed in the meantime?

It would be really nice to have a better debugging experience with proper source maps in the Chrome DevTools or FF, because it kind of works with C/C++ but doesn't work yet with Rust if I am not mistaken.

CC @Alex Crichton @fitzgen (he/him)

Start tracking the debug information origin for each instruction 路 Issue #67 路 rustwasm/walrus
This is intended to be a tracking issue for now that's somewhat light on the details, but I wanted to make sure we had one tagged as sprint for our first 6 week sprint! @fitzgen do you want to ...
I don't believe anyone has worked on this in the meantime, and I'm not aware of anyone who's got plans to work on it
